GSD.product_version: versions from v5.1 to before v5.15.74
GSD.description:
wifi: cfg80211: fix u8 overflow in cfg80211_update_notlisted_nontrans()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.74 by commit 9a8ef2030510a9d6ce86fd535b8d10720230811f, it was introduced in version v5.1 by commit 0b8fb8235be8be99a197e8d948fc0a2df8dc261a. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: wifi: cfg80211: fix u8 overflow in cfg80211_update_notlisted_nontrans()
